actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing Act of 1949.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to extend the following authorities for one year: (1) for payments on notes and obligations for rural housing loan funds; (2) for housing and facilitities for elderly and handicapped families in rural areas; (3) for the Rural Housing Insurance Fund; and (4) for mutual and self-help rural housing. Makes changes in the authorizations for appropriations for low-income repair loans and grants and financial assistance for labor housing.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing Act of 1949.
